src:
رئيس مجلس النواب العراقي يؤكد على إجراء إصلاحات دستورية دون ضغط من الخارج

02 Nov 2019

أكد رئيس ​مجلس النواب العراقي، محمد الحلبوسي، العمل بشكل مكثف ومتواصل من أجل الشعب ومطالبه دون ضغط خارجي، والعمل على إجراء تعديلات دستورية بمشاركة ​ممثلين​ عن المتظاهرين.
وقال الحلبوسي في بيان نشره على موقعه في “الفيسبوك”، إن المجلس ملتزم بـ”الخارطة التي وضعتها المرجعية الرشيدة، التي أثبتت مرة بعد أخرى أنها صمام أمان للعراق، وعنوان وحدته”.
ولفت الحلبوسي في البيان إلى أن مجلس النواب سيكون في حالة انعقاد دائم، من أجل الإسراع بتنفيذ هذه الخارطة.
وشدد الحلبوسي على ضرورة إجراء كل التعديلات الدستورية “بالشراكة مع ممثلين عن المتظاهرين والنخب و الخبراء والأكاديميين المحترمين ممن يعيشون الواقع العراقي بتفاصيله ليحددوا مكامن الخلل ومواطن الإصلاح”.
وأضاف رئيس مجلس النواب أن المجلس سيعمل بشكل مكثف ومتواصل اعتبارا من هذه الليلة “من أجل الشعب ومطالبه، دون ضغط خارجي، إقليميا كان أو دوليا، ودون فرض إرادات شخصية أو حزبية، لما فيه مصلحة العراقيين”.
المصدر: وكالات
text:
LIVE: Partizan - Vojvodina
Minute by minute follow the events of Hum ...

02 Nov 2019



SERBIA SUPERLIG, ROUND 15



PARTIZAN - VOJVODINA 0: 0


BelgradePartizana Stadium Judge: Milos Djordjic

Partizan: Stojkovic - Miletic, Ostojic, Pavlovic, Urosevic - Zdjelar, Scekic - F. Stevanovic, Natho, Asano - Sadik. Reservations: N. Stevanovic, Brezancic, Lutovac, Tosic, L. Pavlovic, Suma, Ivanovic. Coach: Savo Milosevic.
Vojvodina: Rockov - Veselinovic, Djuric, Sanicanin, Devetak - Drincic, Djurisic - Djuricin, Bojic, Eze - Matic. Reserves: Toroman, Topic, Zukic, Petkovic, Nikolic, Gemovic, Stojkovic. Coach: Nenad Lalatovic.



*** LIVE BETS ***



Live news
14:20
We are nearing the first half of the match, with no serious chances so far. Partisan two shots into the goal frame, Voša, except Drinčić's corner kick, did not threaten ...
14:19
18 minutes
Suddenly Nemanja Miletic's chance came, Partizan's back was found in the penalty area, but he was slow to react and the visiting defenders reacted ...
14:13
17 minutes
An interesting attempt by Nikola Drincic, he shot from the corner straight into the goal, but Stojkovic was careful ...
14:11
12 minutes
Filip Stevanovic tried a free kick but the ball didn't reach the Rocks, the shot was blocked ...
14:08
They are nervous black and whites at the start of the match, complaining a lot about referee Djordjic ...
14:07
5 minutes
The first black-and-white attempt was beaten by Takuma Asano from about 20 yards out, a good defense of Roscoe.
14:03
A pretty good rhythm in the opening minutes, Vojvodina will not defend itself, it is clear already ...
14:01
The match has begun!
13:55
The players are leaving the field, we expect the match to start soon ...
13:40
The stadium is vacant
Less than ten minutes before the start of the match, the stadium in Hum is festive. strong wind contributed to bad visit ...
13:30
The Duchess most often saplings forever
We wrote two days ago about statistics that say that Vojvodina scores the most points for Partizan and Red Star. With that in mind, black and white is a very difficult job, especially if one knows that the Old Lady of Novi Sad is the best guest of the Superliga this season.
13:03
WHAT DO THE QUOTES SAY ...
Despite having suffered three defeats in the past four championship matches, Partizan is treated as a slight favorite in the derby. The odds on winning black and whites at the MOZZART Bookmaker are 1.60, the draw pays 3.80, while the eventual win of Vojvodina multiplies each stake by 6.00.
See all the MOZZART Bookie odds for this duel HERE
13:03
WHO'S ON THE CLUB ...
Who is waiting for a chance off the bench is also known.
Partizan Reserves: N. Stevanovic, Brezancic, Lutovac, Tosic, L. Pavlovic, Suma, Ivanovic.
Vojvodina Reserves: Toroman, Topic, Zukic, Petkovic, Nikolic, Gemovic, Stojkovic.
12:56
DON'T PLAY NIKOLIC, MATIC LEADS ATTACK OF VOJVODINA
As for Vojvodina, coach Nenad Lalatovic made the most significant change in the extraordinary round with Indjija. Nemanja Nikolic is not in the top 11 scorers in that match, instead of loaned Partizan point guard Bojan Matic will start, and it is interesting that he got a chance to replace Marko Djurisic instead of Mirko Topic in the announced lineup.
The composition of Vojvodina: Rockov - Veselinovic, Djuric, Sanicanin, Devetak - Drincic, Djurisic - Djuricin, Bojic, Eze - Matic.
12:51
MILOSEVIC MAKES TWO CHANGES
The composition of the teams is known. When it comes to Partizan, Savo Milosevic made two changes to the squad that was defeated on Banovo Brdo by Cukaricki three days ago. Sejduba Suma and Zoran Tosic moved to the bench, with Aleksandar Scekic in the top 11 - meaning Bibras Natho would be the organizer of the game instead of Guinea - and junior Filip Stevanovic.
Partizan team: Stojkovic - Miletic, Ostojic, Pavlovic, Urosevic - Zdjelar, Scekic - F. Stevanovic, Natho, Asano - Sadik.
12:49
Dear visitors of MOZZART Sport, good afternoon and welcome to another gathering. For starters, we follow the derby of the 15th round of the Serbian Superliga, where Partizan and Vojvodina meet at the stadium in Hum.
